sentences.sContent: Once upon a time, there was an abbess in a small abbey .
sentences.sContent_eng: Once upon a time, there was an abbess in a small abbey .
sentences.sCn: 很久以前，一个小修道院里有一个女修道院院长。

remMethod.val: ab + bey(看做obey， 遵守) → 需要遵守很多清规戒律的地方 → 修道院

words.tran: 女修道院院长；女庵主持
神父，僧侣；男修道院院长

trans.tranOther: a large church with buildings next to it where  monk s  and  nun s  live or used to live
